subject: Simmsonn plus X pedals won't connect
description_text:
Hi

I bought the 3 pedal set of the  plus X pedals on AliExpress from your
official store 3 months ago. They worked great till now. As you can see in
the picture below, they show up disconnected, even though they aren't. How
can I fix this? Note that the Windows USB (dis-)connect sound does play
every time I (dis-)connect them. They are directly plugged into my laptop.
[image: image.png]

Thanks in advance for your help.

Regards
Willem Beel

conversations.body_text: Hi Willem Beel,    Please follow the steps below:  1. Enter Firmware Upgrade Mode    Press and hold the “Upgrade” button on the PlusX control box;    While holding the button, reinsert the USB cable;    Release the button once the software shows “Entered Firmware Upgrade Mode”.    2. Manually Restore Firmware    In the software, go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update;    Select the firmware file path: pedals-firmware-pedals-plusx.sfu;    Wait for the upgrade to complete, then reinsert the USB and test the pedals again.
Hi Willem Beel,  If the device still cannot connect after completing the firmware update steps, please try updating again and select the firmware file provided in the attachment.
